casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Edwards, Appellant.
Submitted April 20, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Frank C araño, for appellant.

October 9, 1970:
